title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might seek out costly pleasures or overindulge yourself today in order to relieve pent-up pressures. You could whoosh through too much cash as well in your attempt to blow off steam. However, on some level, you may actually want to lose control to remind yourself that youre a creature of unbridled freedom. Theres nothing wrong with flirting with the edge if you create the right conditions for this kind of expression. Just be sure you can find your way back to balance before throwing your life out of whack. Exercising moderation protects you from regret. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
